long_description: With a kid-friendly size and style, the REI Big School daypack is a stellar choice for your elementary schooler. It provides plenty of room and support for carrying books, binders, jackets and lunch. Sized to fit small frames and shoulders, the REI Big School pack also has a chest strap to provide support when carrying daily school necessities. Fully adjustable and padded, sculpted shoulder straps ensure carrying comfort for all size loads; padded panel protects back from bulky and pointy items. Panel-loading zippered main compartment has plenty of room for books, papers, lunch and a jacket. Front zip pocket features a key fob. Exterior zip pocket provides quick access to small items; mesh side pockets offer water bottle storage. Variable-width webbing strip on front of the REI Big School pack provides a convenient point to clip gear to. Easy-haul carry handle. Strap keepers keep shoulder strap webbing tails controlled and out of the way. Reflective trim provides visibility in low light.
short_description: With a kid-friendly size and style, the REI Big School daypack is a stellar choice for your elementary schooler. It provides plenty of room and support for carrying books, binders, jackets and lunch.
